QuestData.Title: Hex-a-Gone
QuestData.Description:
The harpies are relentless in their pursuit to control the basin. They are able to craft bags of foul magic as quickly as we can destroy them.
The Skyhorn cannot gain the upper hand as long as their hexweaver lives. She must be stopped.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hexweaver Akara must be slain if the Skyhorn wish to gain the upper hand.
QuestData.RewardText: You have done the Skyhorn a great service, $n.
